title: Ragna Crimson
description:
Ragna là một thợ săn rồng "kém cỏi". Anh có một cô em gái vô cùng mạnh mẽ. Một ngày nọ một kẻ địch cực mạnh xuất hiện, đe dọa sinh mạng của em gái Ragna. Lúc này, một nhân vật lạ mặt xuất hiện - ông ta chính là Ragna trong tương lai và đang nắm giữ một sức mạnh vô cùng lớn. 

Ragna tương lai căm ghét sức mạnh của mình, nhưng Ragna hiện tại thì cần nó! Tương lai trao lại sức mạnh cho quá khứ và rồi một thợ săn rồng hùng mạnh ra đời!

title: Mashle: Ma thuật và Cơ bắp (Phần 2)
description: Đây là một thế giới của phép thuật, nơi phép thuật được sử dụng cho mọi thứ. Nhưng sâu trong khu rừng tồn tại một chàng trai dành thời gian của mình để tập luyện. Anh chàng không thể sử dụng phép thuật, nhưng anh ấy tận hưởng một cuộc sống yên bình với cha mình. Nhưng một ngày nọ, cuộc sống của anh ấy bị đe dọa! Liệu cơ thể vạm vỡ của anh ấy có bảo vệ anh ấy khỏi những kẻ sử dụng ma thuật? Cơ bắp được rèn luyện mạnh mẽ sẽ nghiền nát ma thuật khi ảo tưởng ma thuật bất thường này bắt đầu!

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
description: In Mission Impossible: Karma Part One, Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: The hunt for a terrifying new weapon that threatens the entire world. humanity before it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and fate of the world at stake, and the dark forces from Ethan's past closing in, a deadly race across the globe begins. Faced with a mysterious, omnipotent enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing is more important than his mission - including the lives of those he cares about most.
trailer_title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One | Official Trailer (2023 Movie) - Tom Cruise

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Two years after Ethan Hunt successfully captured Solomon Lane, the remnants of the Syndicate reformed into another organization called the Apostles. Under the leadership of a mysterious fundamentalist known only as John Lark, the organization is planning to acquire three plutonium cores. Ethan and his team are sent to Berlin to intercept them, but the mission fails when Ethan saves Luther and the apostles from escaping with the plutonium. With CIA Agent August Walker joining the team, Ethan and his allies must now find the plutonium cores before it's too late.
trailer_title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018) - Official Trailer - Paramount Pictures

title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
description: Handsome actor Tom Cruise returns as the character Ethan Hunt, this time he will have to carry out a super difficult mission: destroy the entire transnational fraud organization Syndicate - a gathering place of intelligent assassins. bright. and most dangerous. Mission Impossible 5 will be directed by Christopher McQuarrie, who worked with Cruise on Jack Reakcer.
trailer_title: Mission Impossible 5 - Rogue Nation | official trailer (2015) Tom Cruise M:i 5

title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
description: Agent Ethan Hunt and his associates were blamed for the Kremlin bombing. IMF - Impossible Mission Force was disbanded by the President. But the real plan is for them to operate outside the organization. Hunt is ordered to cooperate with his colleague Brandt - who knows more about Hunt than Hunt knows about him... Director Brad Bird has been very successful. When adding more comedy situations, the film still maintains balance after the breathtaking action scenes
trailer_title: Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol Official Trailer #1 - Tom Cruise Movie (2011) HD

title: Mission: Impossible III
description: In the third part of the Mission Impossible series, super spy Ethan Hunt wants to "hang up his sword" to get married and focus on training young spies, but he suddenly receives news from the IMF that His former colleague went missing while tracking Owen Davian, an old fox who kills without fear. Ethan must leave the wedding to find Lindsey Farris, but Ethan cannot help her come back from death. Suffering, regretting and hating the person who planted a bomb in her beloved student's head, this female super spy decided to go the whole way that Lindsey went, to find "the two people" among the oligarchs...

title: Mission: Impossible II
description: Mission Impossible 2 Mission Impossible II 2000 Full HD Vietsub Voiceover Mission Impossible II, Mission Impossible II (2000) Following the success of the first part, Mission Impossible II was released. In this part, the super spy encounters a new mission when an extremely dangerous epidemic virus is robbed by a gang with dark intentions. His mission is to destroy that virus before it is used to harm human life and world security. Will the super spy be able to overcome this "impossible" mission? The film has many breathtaking action scenes, under the acting talent of handsome actor Tom Cruise...
trailer_title: MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE 2 Trailer (2000)

title: Mission: Impossible
description: A spy is expelled due to a misunderstanding and his colleagues track down the traitor and the stolen list. The film is associated with the name of Tom Cruise - Hollywood's top actor and is Paramount's biggest success ever. Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is a member of the IMF's special agent group - a force that specializes in carrying out impossible missions. Under the assignment of Jim Phelps (Jon Voight), the group sets out to Prague to prevent the theft of a disc containing a list of the world's top spies and information about their real lives. Work continued as planned until the group fell into an ambush and only Ethan survived. Ethan then goes to see senior commander Kittridge (Henry Czerny), who tells him that there is a traitor in the IMF ranks and that this person has been selling secrets on the black market. But everyone suspects Ethan because he was the only one to escape the attack and disqualifies Ethan as a spy.
trailer_title: Mission: Impossible (1996) Trailer #1 | Movieclips Classic Trailers

title: The Mummy
description:
The Mummy - Thought to rest buried deep in a tomb deep in the terrible desert, an ancient queen (played by Sofia Boutella of Kingsman: The Secret Service and Star Trek Beyond) who The fate that was cruelly snatched away, now awakens in the present day and brings with her the darkness, horror and malice gathered thousands of years ago with the purpose of fighting against humanity. People.
From the sand dunes of the Middle East to the secret labyrinths beneath modern-day London, The Mummy delivers thrilling and thrilling sequences in a vast setting, while also opening up a cinematic world. new of gods and monsters.
trailer_title: The Mummy - Official Trailer #2 [HD]

title: Expend4bles
description: The Expendables 4 revolves around the new mission that the mercenaries undertake, which is to stop the terrorist organization led by Suarto Rahmat, who smuggles nuclear warheads with a plot to create conflict between two military powers, Russia and the United States. Watch the movie The Expendables 4 to admire the breathtaking fighting action scenes of Jason Statham, Sylvester Stallone and famous Hollywood stars. After The Expendables 3 (2014) failed at the box office, the future of the Expendables series became fragile. But at the end of 2016, the Expend4bles project was announced and this was also the last part of the series. Due to disturbances in personnel and planning, objective and subjective factors, the film was delayed for many years and it was not until the second half of 2023 that fans could enjoy this exciting blockbuster. The Expendables 3 was rated PG-13 and was not very successful, which is why part 4 returned to the R rating (like the first 2 parts) with the expectation that it would be a worldwide sensation, bringing in Huge revenue, worthy of the investment of hundreds of millions of dollars for this project.
trailer_title: EXPEND4BLES (2023) Official Trailer - Jason Statham, 50 Cent, Megan Fox, Dolph Lundgren

title: The Expendables
description: The Expendables 3 (The Expendables) - Barney (Stallone), Christmas (Statham) and the rest of the team come face to face with Conrad Stonebanks (Gibson), who the year before co-founded The Expendables with Barney. Stonebanks then became a ruthless arms dealer and someone Barney was forced to kill...but it took longer than he thought. Stonebanks, who avoided death last time, is now on a mission to end The Expendables - but Barney has other plans...
trailer_link: The Expendables 3 (2014 Movie) - Official Teaser Trailer - Sylvester Stallone & Jason Statham

title: The Expendables 2
description: The Expendables 2 (The Expendables 2) - Following the success of The Expendables, The Expendables will have to carry out a mission in remote Nepal where, unfortunately, a member of the team was murdered, the whole group is determined. avenge your teammates amidst countless dangers right in the heart of your opponent. The Expendables 2 is truly an "American" masterpiece with speed, explosiveness, and willingness to sacrifice for something meaningful.
trailer_title: The Expendables 2 (2012) - Official Trailer #1

title: The Expendables
description: The Expendables is an action movie that revolves around the special forces team The Expendables hired to infiltrate a Southern Hat country and overthrow the cruel dictator who is reigning... When mission begins, the special task force suddenly realizes that things are not as they appeared. Then they realize that they, too, have been trapped and find themselves caught in a tangle of dangers of deception and betrayal. Then the special forces team begins to understand that their real enemy is a very cunning former CIA agent James Monroe and his henchman Paine. The Expendables is the most epic action movie of 2010 from Hollywood. The film evokes the glorious era of action movies in the 80s and 90s of the last century and honors the top martial arts performances and real fighting scenes of muscular heroes.
trailer_title: The Expendables (2010) - Official Trailer #1

title: The Mechanic
description: The Mechanic - Arthur Bishop is a "mechanic" - a professional assassin with strict principles and a natural talent for eliminating targets without leaving a trace. . It's a job that requires professional perfection while working as a team, and Bishop is the best choice for the job.
trailer_title: THE MECHANIC (2011) | Hollywood.com Movie Trailers |

title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
description: He uses the power of the sword to revive three wizard kings of the past: Edward Avalaché, Princia Funnybunny, and Jester Garandaros, who share the same vision as him, in order to achieve his goal.
trailer_title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King | Official Trailer | Netflix

title: Transformer 4 : Age Of Existence
description: After the battle between the autobots and Decepticons leveled Chicago, humanity thought all alien robots were a threat. So Harold Attinger, a CIA agent, sets up a unit whose sole purpose is to hunt them all down. But it turns out they are assisted by another alien robot searching for Optimus Prime. Cade Yeager, a "robot expert", buys an old truck and when he examines it, he thinks it is a transformer. When he approved it, he discovered it was Optimus Prime. Then men from the unit appear looking for Optimus. He helps Yeager and his daughter Tessa escape but is chased by hunters. They escape and Yeager learns from the technology he took from the men that a tech tycoon and defense contractor named Joshua Joyce is part of what's going on, so they go find what's happening.
trailer_title: Transformers: Age of Extinction Teaser Trailer

title: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno have been abandoned together at the same church and has been inseparable since then. When they were young, they promised to compete with each other to see who would become the next Magus Emperor. However, when they grow up, some differences between them become simple. Yuno is a genius with magic, with great power and ability to control, while Asta cannot use magic at all, and try to compensate for his shortage by physical exercise. When they received their Grimoa at the age of 15, Yuno had a spectacular book with four -leaf clover (most people have a three -leaf clover), while Asta did not receive anything.
trailer_title: Black Clover - Trailer [HD]

title: Loki
description: Loki talked about when Steve Rogers, Tony Stark and Scott Lang returned to the 2012 milestone, as soon as the battle in New York ended, to "temporarily borrow" Loki's staff. But an unexpected accident occurred, causing Loki to pick up the tesseract repeat and to escape. This escape has led to a disturbing time. TVA Department - Organization to protect the intact of the flow of time, forced to intervene and go to this man to work. Here, Loki has two options, one is to help TVA stabilize time, otherwise it will be destroyed. Of course Loki options first. But this is a very risky move, because this god often fooled, "eel", specializing in stabbing as his natural nature.
trailer_title: Marvel Studios' Loki | Official Trailer | Disney+

title: The Guardian Of The Galaxy 2
description: Revolving around an exciting and dangerous adventure, Guardians of the Galaxy 2 takes us into a world where heroes must not only face the enemies that have troubled them, but also learn about his true heritage. After saving Xandar from Ronan's destruction, the Guardians are recognized as heroes, but now new responsibilities fall on the shoulders of their leader. On this journey, old enemies become allies and betrayal spreads. The Guardians must not only battle their dark pasts, but also face a new threat - more dangerous than ever - from those who seek to rule the galaxy. Can the Guardians overcome these challenges and protect the galaxy from invasion?
trailer_title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Teaser Trailer

title: The Walking Dead
description: The movie The Walking Dead is about the life after the zombie epidemic disaster of a small group of survivors after the outbreak of the pandemic. The survivors try to find a new place to live, running away from the flesh-eating zombies. . When you watch this movie, you will clearly know that the movie's plot focuses mainly on post-apocalyptic humanity and how people fight to survive. Rick Grimes - a former deputy police chief in a small town in Georgia - is the leader of the group. As the situation became increasingly dangerous, the desperation of this group of people pushed them to the brink of panic.
trailer_title: The Walking Dead Trailer (First Season)

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: Avengers: Endgame (Superhero Team 4: Endgame) released in April 2019 will completely resolve the problems that have been outlined throughout the previous 22 films of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Two months later, Spider-Man 2 is a completely new beginning for the MCU. In the previous part, the crazy Titan was always obsessed with the mission to "balance" the universe. After collecting all 6 Infinity Stones, Thanos caused half the world to disappear into dust with just a snap of his fingers. At the beginning of the Endgame teaser trailer, Tony Stark used an Iron Man armor mask to record a video message to his wife Pepper Potts. He said he was on his way back to Earth but unfortunately was lost in space, water and food ran out 4 days ago, oxygen will run out tomorrow, life is now hanging by a thread. bell, death is only a few hours away.
trailer_title: Marvel Studios' Avengers: Endgame - Official Trailer

title: Prison Break
description:
"Prison Break" is a crime television series, broadcast on the FOX television channel from 2005 to 2009. The film has a total of 5 seasons, but season 1 is the first season and is where the story begins.

Prison Break Part 1 revolves around the main character Michael Scofield (played by Wentworth Miller), a smart young engineer, sentenced to death for killing the President of the United States' brothers. However, he believed he was being wronged and tried to plan his escape from Sona prison.
trailer_title: Prison Break - Season 1 Trailer

title: The Worst Of Evil
description:
The Worst of Evil is an upcoming South Korean web television series starring Ji Chang-wook, Wi Ha-joon and Im Se-mi. The film is scheduled to release on Disney+ on September 27, 2023.

Set in the 1980s, The Worst Evil follows undercover police investigators who infiltrate a major criminal organization responsible for the illegal drug trade between Korea, China and Japan.
trailer_title: The Worst of Evil (2023) Official Trailer | Wi Ha Joon, Ji Chang Wook, Lim Se Mi, Bibi

title: The Nun
description: The Nun is set at Carța monastery in Romania in 1952, where a nun has just mysteriously died. Faced with that situation, the Vatican sent Father Burke and the young nun Irene to investigate the incident. Burke is an experienced exorcist while Irene has the ability to see omens of the future. Right at God's abode, they had to confront the terrible devil in the guise of a nun.
trailer_title: THE NUN - Official Teaser Trailer [HD]

title: Parasite
description: Parasite 2019 Full HD Vietsub Parasite revolves around two completely opposite families: one is extremely rich, and the other always lives in poverty. They met and got to know each other by chance after an unexpected event.
trailer_title: Parasite 기생충 - Official Trailer

title: IT: Chapter Two
description: It Chapter Two is still the story of the boys and girls of The Losers Club, who have now grown up and face countless problems in life. Not stopping there, the haunted clown Pennywise appears every 27 years in the town of Derry, forcing the 7 boys and girls to continue to be involved in the next encounter between good and evil. Although the group may have become more mature and wiser, their battle with Pennywise still had unexpected consequences, even causing some members to experience extreme pain.
trailer_title: It Chapter Two | IMAX® Exclusive Teaser Trailer

title: Aquaman 2 : The Lost Kingdom
description: In Aquaman And The Lost Kingdom (Aquaman 2: The Lost Kingdom), Aquaman will face greater challenges than ever. Black Manta, his sworn enemy, has returned stronger, wielding the power of the mystical black trident. Black Manta is seeking to unleash an ancient force and destroy the world, forcing Aquaman to team up with his half-brother, Orm, to prevent disaster. Their journey will take them to mysterious seas, explore lost kingdoms and face dangerous, unknown sea creatures.
trailer_title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom | Trailer

title: Solo Leveling
description: In a world where hunters, humans possessing magical abilities, must fight deadly monsters to protect humanity from destruction, a famously weak hunter named Sung Jin -woo finds himself in a seemingly endless struggle for survival. One day, after narrowly surviving an extremely powerful double dungeon that almost wiped out his entire group, a mysterious program called the System chose him as its sole player. , in return, it grants him an extremely rare ability to level up his power, which can go far beyond any known limits. Jin-woo then embarks on a new journey as he must fight against all types of enemies, both human and monster, to discover the secrets of the dungeons and the true source of his power. his strength.
trailer_title: Solo Leveling | Official TRAILER

title: Venom 2 : Let There Be Carnage
description:
In the film, Eddie Brock has returned to San Francisco and is trying to find a way to put his life back together after his loss and separation from Venom. However, everything turned upside down when Cletus Kasady (played by Woody Harrelson), who escaped from prison, became a criminal and became the owner of Carnage's power.

Eddie and Venom must face this new threat and try to stop Cletus Kasady and Carnage from bringing disaster to the world. Besides that, they also have to face a mysterious woman, Frances Barrison (played by Naomie Harris), whose powers are also quite scary.
trailer_title: VENOM: LET THERE BE CARNAGE - Official Trailer 2 (HD)

title: Kimetsu No Yaiba
description: The Demon Slayer Sword is also known as the Demon Slayer Blade or Yaiba Kimetsu. Movie Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba. In ancient times, there was a legend about man-eating demons always wandering in the deep forest. Because of this, the villagers never go out after dark. Legend also says that there is a Demon Slayer who always appears at night to destroy these bloodthirsty demons. For young Tanjiro, that folk tale has become a bitter reality that he must endure.
trailer_title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Trailer
